Transformation Matrix Factory¶

class TransformationMatrixFactory.TransformationMatrixFactory[source]¶

Different methods for rotation matrix computation

Methods

Rotation_2Vectors(points, a1, a2) compute rotation matrix from vector a1 to a2 rotation by angle between a1 and a2 around the unit vector
Rotation_AxisAngle(points, axis, theta) create rotation matrix given axis and angle
Rotation_EulerAngles(points, angles[, dtype]) Given rotation angles build a rotation matrix
Rotation_Quaternion(points, q) create rotation matrix given axis and angle
static Rotation_2Vectors(points, a1, a2)[source]¶

compute rotation matrix from vector a1 to a2 rotation by angle between a1 and a2 around the unit vector

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) – points to rotate
  • a1 – a2: row vectors
Returns:

R rotation matrix
Return type:

3x3 nd-array
static Rotation_AxisAngle(points, axis, theta)[source]¶

create rotation matrix given axis and angle

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) – points to rotate
  • axis (nx1 or 1xn nd-array) – axis to rotate around
  • theta – rotation angle in degrees
Return type:

3x3 nd-array
static Rotation_EulerAngles(points, angles, dtype='degrees')[source]¶

Given rotation angles build a rotation matrix

param points: points to rotate
param angles: omega, phi, kappa
param dtype: radians, degrees or symbolic

Warning

Symbolic option should be checked

type points: PointSet
type angles: tuple
type dtype: str
Returns: R rotation matrix
Return type: 3x3 nd-array
static Rotation_Quaternion(points, q)[source]¶

create rotation matrix given axis and angle

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) – (PointSet) points to rotate
  • q (np.ndarray 4x1) – quaternion
Returns:

R rotation matrix
Return type:

np.ndarray 3x3
